title: Began with a Rose
features: Began with a Rose is a collection of poetry focusing on the gritty and empowering themes of love, nature, pain, depression, hope, and strength. The poems entail painful struggles, but also a courageous and rejuvenating outlook on life.
description: Savannah Jade lives in Southern California. She currently attends a local college and enjoys embarking on spontaneous traveling trips in her free time. Within the following years she plans on publishing more poetry and eventually a series of novels. For more of her work visit her Instagram page or website. IG: @JadePoetry jadepoetry.com
